root.name: Legends of Loot
root.description: OverviewLegends of Loot is a dungeon crawler developed and published by Majesco for the iPhone, iPad, and Android platforms.GameplayLegends of Loot has two main gameplay mechanics; a top down perspective dungeon crawling/puzzle solving element and a first person RPG style battle system.StagesThere are close to 100 different mazes/levels to explore in Legends of Loot spread across four different settings or regions. The regions that make up the games settings are:EgyptianMayanMedievalAsian
